original_text: Aaron and his sons shall eat the rest of it, but it is to be eaten without yeast in the sanctuary area; they are to eat it in the courtyard of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 아론과 그의 자손이 먹되 누룩을 넣지 말고 거룩한 곳 회막 뜰에서 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: Aaron and his sons shall eat the rest of it
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들은 그 나머지를 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: but it is to be eaten without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 누룩 없이 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: in the courtyard of the tent of meeting
